resources.string: Tracking Fresh ensures that you get the right blend of nutrition and cost with these hybrid tomatoes. They are not like the conventional tomatoes which are restricted to seasons but these are found all year round. They have a firm and juicy texture and can perish at room temperature for longer periods.
leafy vegetables | root vegetable | green chili | raw garlic | white radish | watermelon fruit

The product images shown are for illustration purposes only and may not be an exact representation of the product. Tracking Fresh reserves the right to change product images and specifications at any time without notice.
Pick Up (If Pick up is checked, above address is not applicable. User will come to Vehicle and buy the product.)
